targets.query: SELECT (non_negative_derivative(max("ibuf_merges_insert"),1s) + non_negative_derivative(max("ibuf_merges_delete"),1s) + non_negative_derivative(max("ibuf_merges_delete_mark"),1s))/non_negative_derivative(max("ibuf_merges"),1s) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

seriesOverrides.alias: Page Merge Successes / Page Merge Attempts

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("index_page_splits"),1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("adaptive_hash_searches_btree"),1s) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

targets.alias: Page Merge Successes / Page Merge Attempts
targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("index_page_merge_successful"),1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("index_page_merge_attempts"),1s)*100 FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("index_page_reorg_successful"),1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("index_page_reorg_attempts"),1s)  FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT difference(last("lock_rec_lock_removed")) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT difference(last("lock_rec_lock_removed")) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

targets.alias: Transaction Ids Assigned NOTE: Needs Implementing. Max transaction ID can be found using 'show engine innodb status'

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("trx_rw_commits"),1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("log_writes"),1s) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("adaptive_hash_searches"),1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("adaptive_hash_searches_btree"),1s) FROM "mysql_innodb" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

list.label: Host
list.name: Host
list.query: show tag values on "telegraf" from "mysql" with key = "host"
